responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: What do you have the price for this?
responses: We will charge you for the process based on your selections. We'll update that later.

patterns: You dont have cash on delivery?
How will I have to pay?
When do I get my order?
When will you send it to me?
What time will this process take?
responses: Rescheduling process will take few minutes only.

patterns: What is the process of visa rescheduling?
responses: I can reschedule your visa application dates just through this chat, without any hustle.
I will reschedule your application dates you enter and book it myself.

patterns: What dates are available for my rescheduling?
Which are the dates that i have?
Tell me dates that are available?
Can you check which dates are available?
I want to check my dates.
responses: To check dates available, just type 'dates'.

patterns: How will you get my data?
How will I have to login?
How will you get my account?
Can you check it with my application number?
How will you take my account?
How will you get my dates?
How can I add my account?
How will I have to signup for this?
How should I signup for this?
responses: For that you need to login, just type 'login'.

patterns: How will I have to logout?
How will you remove my account?
Can you remove my application number?
How will you remove my account?
responses: To log out of the system, just type 'logout'.
